meanings.definition: Greedy or selfish in trying to get or hold things
meanings.sent1: The grasping man refused to share his toys with the other children.
meanings.sent2: She had a grasping attitude when it came to collecting rare coins.
meanings.sent3: The grasping squirrel hoarded all the nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: His grasping behavior towards money made him lose many friends.
meanings.sent5: The grasping character in the story always put his own interests above others'.

meanings.sent3: The robot had a grasping claw that could pick up objects with precision.
meanings.sent4: The octopus's grasping tentacles wrapped around its prey tightly.
meanings.sent5: The tree's grasping roots anchored it firmly in the ground.
